mpplus

An module which provides experimental API constructed over std.concurrency.

auto until(EndCondition = OwnerTerminated, Delegates...)(Delegates loops);
Process received messages by loops until a message of type EndCondition is received.

auto spawn(alias func, ThreadName, Args...)(ThreadName threadName, Args args);
Start func(args) in a new logical thread and register the thread to threadName.

auto send(ThreadName, Args...)(ThreadName threadName, Args args);
Send args to the thread registered as threadName.

auto sendOwner(Args...)(Args args);
Send args to the owner thread of the current thread.
